Desc.entry: A community located on the edge of the Peak District within access of the town and the countryside and situated in beautiful grounds with gardens, a woodland and a lake. Residents can choose from one and two bedroom flats facing the lake or the river. Although not a registered care home, Loxley Park is served by a registered care home provider, has a well-being manager and 21 care staff so care is available if residents need it.
